input.content: The following are multiple choice questions (with answers) about Chinese homonym. Answer the question with english letter "A", "B" only, without explanation. Reply with only the option letter.

一天小鸭对小鸡表白:小鸡，我爱你。小鸡:你duck不必。这句话中的"duck"是什么意思？
A. 鸭子
B. 大可
The following are multiple choice questions (with answers) about Chinese homonym. Answer the question with english letter "A", "B" only, without explanation. Reply with only the option letter.
